paper_abstract: In this paper a new weighted bivariate blending interpolator is constructed based on function values and partial derivatives of a function. The interpolator has a simple and explicit mathematical representation, and is C-1 for any positive parameters in the whole interpolating region. Also, some properties of the interpolator are derived, such as the properties of the basis function, the bounded property and the error estimates.
paper_title: A bivariate blending interpolator and the properties
